com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.security
Interface IAuthenticationModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
PermissiveAuthentication
public interface IAuthenticationModule

Interface class that all loadable authentication modules should implement.

Startup param for tomcat is is -DAUmodule_connectorinstancename=com.yourmodule.YourAUClass
